messages.content: You are tasked with creating a structured output from the provided user message.

Files containing the implementation:

- app/Http/Controllers/Api/V1/PostCommentController.php

Explanation:

- I searched the codebase for the PostCommentController class and found the API controller at app/Http/Controllers/Api/V1/PostCommentController.php. This file defines the class App\Http\Controllers\Api\V1\PostCommentController and implements the index(Request $request, Post $post): ResourceCollection method used by the route /v1/posts/{post}/comments. The index method returns a paginated collection of comments (with author relation) wrapped in CommentResource.
- Note: there is also a similarly named web controller at app/Http/Controllers/PostCommentController.php, but its namespace is App\Http\Controllers (not App\Http\Controllers\Api\V1). The route in routes/api.php references App\Http\Controllers\Api\V1\PostCommentController, so the API controller above is the one used.

files.description: List of paths to the files that contain the handler implementations.
